JOB DESCRIPTION: Change the future with us!      Responsible to create test automation SCRIPTS using C#, Selenium   Effectively collaborate on cross-functional and globally located teams including other testers, developers, and business partners   Monitor automation processes   Prepare result reports, defect status reports and document all bug issues   Stay abreast of technology trends and industry best practices in testing   Keen to learn new technologies and concepts and thrive in an agile environment   Active contribution in improving overall testability of the product and improve release quality     Use your skills to move the world forward!      We need a BE/ BTech graduate in IT, Electronics, Computer Science or equivalent specialization   You should have 3 years of experience C#    Experience working on Angular   Domain skill knowledge in PCS7   You should be Assertive and good in logical reasoning   Good communication skills and should be a good team player
